Park Boram

Korean: 박보람

Height:
5'5" (165 cm)

Introduction

Park Boram (박보람) was a South Korean singer-songwriter under Xanadu Entertainment. She first appeared in the talent show "Superstar K" in 2010 where she finished eighth place. From then she started training until she made her official debut in 2014 with the digital single "Beautiful."

On April 12th, Xanadu Entertainment confirmed reports that Park Bo Ram tragically passed away on the night of April 11th. They declined to release details regarding the singer's passing.
